 2008-17972008-11-28,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
ActStandards Council of Canada Act
PrecisRe-appointment of HUGH A. KRENTZ of Calgary, Alberta, to be a member of the Standards Council of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year; and designation of HUGH A. KRENTZ as Chairperson of the Standards Council of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of one year.
